conversation.message: Remove the brackets and simplify (x - 2)².

To simplify (x - 2)², expand it as (x - 2)(x - 2). Use the distributive property (FOIL method): Multiply x by x to get x², x by -2 to get -2x, -2 by x to get -2x, and -2 by -2 to get 4. Combine all the terms: x² - 2x - 2x + 4 simplifies to x² - 4x + 4. The simplified expression is: x² - 4x + 4. Do you understand this step?
